> Am 11.11.2025 - 13:24 schrieb service@simsonn.com:
>
>
> Hi Hansdampfer,
> 
> Launch the latest version of SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.
> 
> 
> On the “Plus X” control unit, press and hold the “Upgrade” button.
> 
> 
> While holding the button, unplug the USB cable from the PC and then plug it back in. The software should detect the device entering “SIMSONN Flasher update mode”.
> 
> 
> In the software go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update.
> 
> 
> In the file selector choose: pedals‑firmware → pedals‑plusx.sfu.
> 
> 
> Click “Start Update” and wait until the firmware is completely written. During this process do not disconnect the USB or close the application.
> 
> 
> Once the update is finished (you’ll get a success prompt or the unit will reboot), unplug and re‑plug the USB then test the pedal device to confirm everything works correctly.
> 
>
